original_text: Israel will no longer suffer because of the nations that are around them. Those nations will not be like sharp thorns that give the Israelites pain. They will not insult the Israelites any more. Then they will know that I am the Almighty Lord. Israel will no longer suffer because of the nations that are around them. Those nations will not be like sharp thorns that give the Israelites pain. They will not insult the Israelites any more. Then they will know that I am the Almighty Lord. Israel will no longer suffer because of the nations that are around them. Those nations will not be like sharp thorns that give the Israelites pain. They will not insult the Israelites any more. Then they will know that I am the Almighty Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속에게는 그 사방에서 그들을 멸시하는 자 중에 찌르는 가시와 아프게 하는 가시가 다시는 없으리니 내가 주 여호와인 줄을 그들이 알리라

sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘은 더 이상 고통받지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: because of the nations that are around them
Those nations will not be like sharp thorns
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나라들은 날카로운 가시처럼 되지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will not insult the Israelites any more
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 이스라엘 사람들을 모욕하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that I am the Almighty Lord
